賴.definition: to depend on; to hang on in a place; bad; to renege (on promise); to disclaim; to rat (on debts); rascally; to blame; to put the blame on

賴以.definition: to rely on; to depend on

賴婚.definition: to go back on a marriage contract; to repudiate an engagement

賴床.definition: to have a lie-in; to dawdle in bed

賴斯.definition: Rice (name); Condoleezza Rice (1954-) US Secretary of State 2005-2009

賴昌星.definition: Lai Changxing (1958-), notorious Xiamen mafia boss involved in large scale corruption and smuggling, extradited from Canada back to China in 2008

賴校族.definition: campus dwellers (slang); graduates who cannot break away from campus life

賴清德.definition: William Lai Ching-te (1959-), Taiwanese DPP politician, vice president of the Republic of China from 2020

賴聲川.definition: Lai Shengchuan (1954-), US-Taiwanese dramatist and director
